name: 2Nova Interactive
overview:
About 2Nova Interactive

2Nova Interactive provides high-quality services to agencies and brands. We prototype, design and develop digital solutions of different scale. We strive to be leaders in what we do.

We do Planning, design and development for digital-projects Maintenance and support for websites, mobile applications Regular pre-sales support Technology Consulting We cover UX Design Graphic design and illustrations Application, game and web development Mobile application development Research and development Hardware engineering

The company originates from the leading IT University of Russia. From the first days we solve complex technology problems and invest in R&D to offer our clients a cutting edge expertise.

Platforms Web Social networks (Facebook, Vkontakte, Twitter, etc.) iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Symbian Desktop Applications Touch and multitouch booths and tables Interactive Showcases Robotics Technologies Web 3.0 Flash, Air, Silverlight, Flash 3D 3D Graphics (OpenGL, DirectX) Physics simulation and parallel computing (PhysX, CUDA) Augmented Reality Kinect, PS Move Motion detection Image and people detection/tracking Audience Games

Specialties

UX Design, Graphic design and illustrations, Application, game and web development, Mobile application development, Research and development, Hardware engineering
